install.name: AcyMailing Tag : Website links
install.author: Acyba
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2011 ACYBA SARL - All rights reserved.
install.description: This plugin enables you to add links in your Newsletter such as "read in your browser" or "forward to a friend"

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: viewtemplate
param.label: Display the online version
param.description: Select if you want to display the online version (when the user clicks on the view it online link) without any Joomla module (no template) or inside your default Joomla Template

param.name: forwardtemplate
param.label: Display the forward version
param.description: Select if you want to display the forward page (when the user clicks on the forward link) without any Joomla module (no template) or inside your default Joomla Template

param.name: addkey
param.label: Add Newsletter key
param.description: Add the Newsletter key in the link so the online version will be always accessible from the link inserted in the Newsletter

param.name: adduserkey
param.label: Add User key
param.description: Add the user key in the link so the online version will contain the personal information as well
